document.full_text: republican lawmakers are "playing with fire" by contemplating even a brief debt default as a means to force deeper government spending cuts, an adviser to china's central bank said on wednesday.
document.title: china warns u.s. debt-default idea is "playing with fire"
lines_and_colors: republican lawmakers are "playing with fire" by contemplating even a brief debt default as a means to force deeper government spending cuts, an adviser to china's central bank said on wednesday.
